file_content.text: Your duties here are finished.
There's a lot of men with a lot of guns. Can't all be for us.
Now we know how others feel when Intelligence shows up unannounced.
I don't suppose you know these people?
How good to see so many visitors from the Ministry of War.
Charged particle traces suggest recent weapons discharge.
Failure and disobedience are one and the same....
My lord, I tried--
In the Sith tongue, both translate as "treason." That is the wisdom of the ancients!
I am Cipher Nine, the Hand of Jadus, reporting as directed. I want an explanation.
What's going on?
Cipher Nine, reporting as ordered. I want an explanation.
What's going on?
Put Watcher Three down.
Let him go. Now.
[Remain silent]
My lord. You asked to be notified....
The Hand of Jadus, at last. I bear news.
The Cipher agent. You defeated the traitor Jadus and the fools in the SIS. My masters acknowledge your service.
By order of the Dark Council, Operations Division is dissolved. Personnel will be reassigned to wartime units or to deserving Sith Lords.
Do you intend to "reassign" me, as well?
What about me?
There is a grander role for you outside this nest of treason and conspiracy theories.
I would've expected to hear this from Lord Jadus himself.
Lord Jadus approved this?
The Dark Council was united in this decision. That is all I know.
But you serve Intelligence no longer. By order of the Dark Council, Operations Division is dissolved. Personnel will be reassigned to wartime units or to deserving Sith Lords.
With due respect, Operations is needed now more than ever.
Why dissolve Intelligence?
Yes, it is.
I obey the word of the Sith, of course.
As you wish.
Excellent. Then we butcher the beast for its meat.
Don't be stupid. Without Intelligence, our enemies gain the advantage.
You're making a huge mistake.
You are valuable, yet your life is still worth less than a drop of Sith blood.
The war does not go well, whatever the official word. The Ministry of War must have resources, and Intelligence fails to do its part.
We hear rumors of corruption and treason. Agents wasted chasing conspiracies, a brain-dead Keeper... time to butcher the beast for its meat.
I won't argue the point. What happens next?
Then the decision's been made.
You take on your new role.
You mentioned that "deserving Sith Lords" will take over....
Who benefits from all this?
Intelligence has given its dregs to Lord Baras and Lord Sangus before. They will make better use of your finest.
You don't even realize you're being manipulated--or the damage you'll do.
You arrogant idiot.
I will teach you respect.
But first, your team. Surrender the Rattataki.
Hey--what?
Ship secure, my lord. We found the alien outside a cantina.
I was on a break. What's the deal?
Intelligence may overlook her past, but she is an anarchist and an enemy of the Empire. She will be interrogated and judged.
I will kill you. You get that? I will kill you!
Kaliyo's service has been exemplary, and we've put far worse on the payroll.
This isn't necessary.
The decision was not mine. Unless you intend to slaughter the entire Citadel, do not test me.
Fine.
You and I both know what this is about. You want my team at half-strength, fine. But don't take her.
Take someone else.
You have no one I want.
One day you'll regret that answer.
You'll pay for this.
I'm sorry. I don't think we have much of a choice.
Go with him, Kaliyo.
They can't hold you; you're too good for that. Wait for an opportunity.
Run for it as soon as you can.
You and I aren't finished, agent! These people are dead, the Star Cabal's dead, and I'm going to find you!
These people are dead! And when I'm through with them, you and me are gonna finish this, I swear!
The rest of your team can remain intact.
As for you... by special request of the Minister of Intelligence, you are being transferred to my brigade on the Corellian front lines.
Together, we will drown the Republic in blood!
I'm so sorry, sir.
You all know your assignments. Get moving!
Go with him, Kaliyo.
Run for it as soon as you can.
